chart_metadata.name: ffmpeg-worker
chart_metadata.description: FFmpeg worker to read the RTSP streams to mpegts files

runAsContext.description: ffmpeg worker runs as root user.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to chown files.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SYS_CHROOT
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to use chroot.

capabilities.name: MKNOD
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to create device nodes.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to bypass permission checks.

capabilities.name: FSETID
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to set file capabilities.

capabilities.name: KILL
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to kill processes.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETPCAP
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to set process capabilities.

capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to bind to privileged ports.

capabilities.name: SETFCAP
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to set file capabilities.

capabilities.name: NET_RAW
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to use raw sockets.

capabilities.name: AUDIT_WRITE
capabilities.description: FFmpeg worker is able to write to audit log.

0.1.0.app_readme: FFmpeg worker to read the RTSP streams to mpegts files.
0.1.0.detailed_readme: FFmpeg worker to read the RTSP streams to mpegts files.
